description: Mappings from collected variables to standard/harmonised variables, optionally including ETL syntax
collection that contains the source variable(s)
dataset that contains the source variable(s)
optional, source variable that was mapped from. You may also indicate that a mapping to a target variable was not done and leave this field empty (match = not available)
optional, variable from other source datasets. Initially one may only define mapping between releases
collection that contains the target variable
dataset that contains the target variable
target variable that was mapped to
in case of mapping to a repeated variable, specify which repeats were mapped to. Otherwise specifify 'NA'
human readible description of the mapping
formal definition of the mapping, ideally executable code
